metaTitle: VILLAS VICTORIA IV Els Poblets | Luxury Villas from €415,000
metaDescription: Discover VILLAS VICTORIA IV in Els Poblets. Modern 3-bedroom villas from €415,000. By VICTORIA PLAYA. Delivery December 2025. Costa Blanca luxury living.

content.heroIntro: Experience modern Mediterranean living at VILLAS VICTORIA IV, an exceptional residential development by trusted developer VICTORIA PLAYA in the heart of Partida Blarinquetas, Els Poblets. With only 2 premium villas available, this exclusive project offers discerning buyers an unparalleled opportunity to own a contemporary home in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after locations. Each spacious villa features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and ranges from 88 to 98 square meters of beautifully designed living space, set on generous plots of 239 to 381 square meters. Priced from just €415,000, VILLAS VICTORIA IV represents exceptional value—40% less than comparable properties on Spanish islands. Scheduled for completion on December 1st, 2025, these villas combine architectural excellence with investment potential in a thriving community where property values have increased 8% year-on-year. Whether you're seeking a Mediterranean home, a rental investment generating €800 weekly, or a permanent base in Spain's most welcoming expat destination, VILLAS VICTORIA IV delivers sophistication, location, and lasting value.

locationSection.intro: Partida Blarinquetas, Els Poblets, sits at the heart of Costa Blanca's most dynamic region. This charming coastal village balances authentic Spanish character with modern convenience, making it an ideal base for both permanent residents and international buyers. Els Poblets is celebrated for its welcoming international community where English is widely spoken, ensuring a smooth transition for foreign property owners. The area offers exceptional quality of life: world-class healthcare within minutes, award-winning beaches minutes away, championship golf courses for enthusiasts, and excellent shopping and dining options throughout the town. The strategic location provides easy access to Alicante's amenities while maintaining the peaceful, relaxed lifestyle that makes Costa Blanca irresistible. Infrastructure is modern and reliable, with excellent bus connections and easy access to motorways for those exploring beyond the region. Els Poblets has emerged as a prime investment destination, attracting international buyers who appreciate genuine value and authentic Mediterranean living.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum, Local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining options throughout Els Poblets

propertyFeatures.intro: VILLAS VICTORIA IV represents the pinnacle of contemporary Spanish residential design. Each villa is constructed to the highest standards using premium materials and modern building techniques. The developments feature robust double-glazed windows with thermal breaks for energy efficiency, professional air conditioning pre-installation for maximum comfort in the Mediterranean climate, and high-quality ceramic flooring throughout. Every detail has been carefully considered to provide both aesthetic appeal and practical functionality for modern family living.

content.investmentSection: VILLAS VICTORIA IV presents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Europe's most attractive property markets. Els Poblets has demonstrated consistent growth with property values increasing 8% year-on-year, reflecting strong underlying demand from both European and international buyers. Positioned 40% below comparable property prices on Spanish islands, these villas offer exceptional value appreciation potential. The rental market is particularly strong, with 7-night rental rates averaging €800, creating immediate income opportunities for investors. Average market prices in the region stand at €2,200 per square meter, providing excellent returns for those purchasing below market rates. The established international community ensures steady demand for holiday rentals and long-term leases. For investors seeking both lifestyle benefits and financial returns, VILLAS VICTORIA IV delivers on both fronts.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in VILLAS VICTORIA IV?
faqs.answer: Properties start from €415,000. VILLAS VICTORIA IV offers 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom villas with built sizes of 88-98 square meters on plots of 239-381 square meters. Only 2 units are available. Contact us for current pricing and availability details.

faqs.question: When will VILLAS VICTORIA IV be completed?
faqs.answer: Completion is scheduled for December 1st, 2025. VICTORIA PLAYA provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. We can provide specific delivery schedules and payment plans upon inquiry.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of VILLAS VICTORIA IV?
faqs.answer: VICTORIA PLAYA is the developer. They have established credibility building quality residential properties throughout Els Poblets and the surrounding Costa Blanca region, with a reputation for timely delivery and excellent construction standards.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes. Costa Blanca is one of Europe's premier property investment destinations. Els Poblets specifically offers an established international community where English is commonly spoken, consistent property value growth of 8% year-on-year, and excellent amenities including healthcare, beaches, golf, and shopping.

faqs.question: How far is VILLAS VICTORIA IV from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20 minutes of VILLAS VICTORIA IV. The area is famous for pristine Mediterranean coastline with excellent facilities, water sports, and beach restaurants.

faqs.question: What amenities are near VILLAS VICTORIA IV?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: Supermarkets (Mercadona, Lidl, Consum), Regional hospital within 30 minutes with English-speaking doctors, Several championship golf courses, Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, International schools with British curriculum options, and diverse restaurants throughout Els Poblets.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes. Foreign nationals can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. You do not need Spanish residency or a visa to buy property. We can guide you through the legal process and introduce you to English-speaking legal professionals who specialize in international property transactions.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect additional costs including transfer tax (6-10% depending on region), notary fees (1-2%), property registration fees, and legal fees (1-2%). VILLAS VICTORIA IV at €415,000 represents excellent value with total acquisition costs typically lower than northern European markets.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential of VILLAS VICTORIA IV?
faqs.answer: 7-night rental rates in the Els Poblets area average €800, with strong seasonal demand from European holiday makers. Many owners achieve higher rates during peak summer months. Properties typically generate positive rental yields while maintaining capital appreciation potential.

faqs.question: Is there a large expat community in Els Poblets?
faqs.answer: Yes. Els Poblets has an established and welcoming international community with English widely spoken throughout the town. International schools, English-speaking healthcare providers, and expat-friendly services make integration straightforward for foreign residents.

content.conclusion: VILLAS VICTORIA IV represents your gateway to Mediterranean luxury living, investment potential, and authentic Spanish lifestyle. With only 2 exclusive villas available from VICTORIA PLAYA, priced from €415,000 and scheduled for December 2025 delivery, this is a rare opportunity to own a premium property in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable locations. Whether you envision a personal retreat, a rental investment, or your new permanent home, VILLAS VICTORIA IV delivers exceptional value, modern design, and proven market growth. The combination of strategic location, trusted developer, international community, and strong returns makes this development an outstanding choice. Take the next step toward your Costa Blanca dream. Contact us via WhatsApp for exclusive information, viewing schedules, payment plans, and personalized investment guidance. Our English-speaking team is ready to assist you in making this important decision.
